mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lx_card_emp(emp_id, lx_card_emp_year, lx_card_emp_start_time, lx_card_emp_end_time, is_use) VALUES (#{emp_id}, #{lx_card_emp_year}, #{lx_card_emp_start_time}, #{lx_card_emp_end_time}, #{is_use})
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*,lemp.emp_number as emp_number,lemp.emp_mobile as emp_mobile,lemp.emp_name as emp_name,lemp.emp_cover as emp_cover from lx_card_emp sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp lemp ON lemp.emp_id = sn.emp_id WHERE sn.emp_id=#{emp_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE lx_card_emp SET is_use='1' WHERE lx_card_emp_end_time < #{nowTime}

UPDATE lx_emp lemp
LEFT JOIN lx_card_emp lcard ON lcard.emp_id = lemp.emp_id
SET lemp.is_card_emp = '0'
WHERE lcard.lx_card_emp_end_time < #{nowTime}
